pages.text: The $(item)Altar Core$() is the centerpiece of the ritual crafting system. Place 4 $(item)Ritual Pedestals$() around it in a cross pattern.$(br2)To perform a ritual:$(br)$(li)Place ingredients on pedestals$(li)Right-click the Altar Core$(li)Mana will be consumed$(li)Result appears on the Altar
Altar Core recipe - requires Diamond Block.
Craft 4 pedestals for a complete altar setup.
